response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value and significance, matching your needs perfectly. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an unparalleled experience while maximizing my earnings. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product and offers a fair deal for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
